ygData.subject: Re: list and stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: definitly nice to see some posts today :)  another question for the ogre s and trolls.  I use a 2handed weapon, as I didn t really see the need for a shield
ygData.messageBody:
definitly nice to see some posts today :) another question for the ogre's
and trolls. I use a 2handed weapon, as I didn't really see the need for a
shield and bash as we can slam. Anyone found anything different and
actually use a 1handed weapon?

Barto

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Leif Smart [mailto:leifsmart@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 10:59 AM
> To: shadowknight@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [shadowknight] list and stuff
>
>
> From: "Leif Smart" <leifsmart@...>
>
> Hi all!
>
> Good to see a little action on the SK list again! I just thought
> I'd add my
> 2 cp worth.
> I play a Human Sk on Veeshan. Just a bub off lvl 28 now and hangin for my
> new spells! I'm still mostly in banded but quite a few magical
> pieces on me
> such as Barbed arms, grotesque mask and black crown. I carry a Bibs for 2H
> and a PGT with cracked darkwood for 1H. I've founbd that in a
> small group of
> less then 3 I'm better off with the 1 H since it is more of a defensive
> setup while in a larger group dmg done is more important so I use
> the bibs.
> I also carry a Dragoon Dirk in my range slot foir the Dex bonus
> which means
> I can't carry my beloved Ashwood Bow
>
>
> My favourtie story would have to be when I dueled someone. The whole diel
> lasted 30 min which is more of a marathon. Using a combination of shadow
> step and attckking I employed hit and run tactics. Eventually I succumbed
> having only done 127 dmg total 8( I don;t feel too bad however since the
> person I was dueling was a lvl 38 Necro when I was just lvl 26.
> Imagine what
> it would have been like if we had been close in lvl! I trully
> beleive the SK
> are nest best duellers after the Casters and even then we can give them a
> run for their mioney!
>
> That''s about it for me!
> I'll keep in touch!
>
> Good hunting to you all!
>
> Inos
> Veeshan
>
>
